subject: [Lab 13] Q1: Give Interest
content:
Q1: Give Interest

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q1: Give Interest in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: ![](/redirect/s3?bucket=uploads&prefix=attach%2Fjziyku5gomy7aq%2Fj4db1e2a3zb2j6%2Fk3f7putfb4sl%2FScreen_Shot_20191125_at_5.59.08_PM.png)  I don't understand why I'm also outputting the original table data along with the modified table

follow-ups.feedback: Are you using `INSERT INTO` or `UPDATE`? You should be using the latter.

threads.question: ![](/redirect/s3?bucket=uploads&prefix=attach%2Fjziyku5gomy7aq%2Fjz1zsn3o5836lt%2Fk3i0djflxkyd%2FScreen_Shot_20191127_at_4.57.07_PM.png)  I'm updating the values of amount for all accounts, why is it not working correctly?

follow-ups.feedback: It looks like you’re running the wrong test case. Make sure you are running `python3 ok -q give-interest`.

threads.question: How do we view the original tables? I can't seem to find them or what the column names are? Are we supposed to have access to this information?

follow-ups.feedback: Wait I found it, it's in the data.sql file

threads.question: I am a bit confused about this problem. How can we change the data unless we wrote a separate SELECT statement for each account holder?  Is there something(such as a function or so) that modifies the data for us?  Thanks!

follow-ups.feedback: Yes! Refer to last Friday’s lecture to learn about the statements you will need to use to solve these homework questions, then come back if you need additional help.
